mapper.select: SELECT novelNum, c.characterNum AS characterNum, characterName FROM EpisodeCharacter e, `Character` c WHERE e.episodeNum = #{episodeNum} AND e.characterNum = c.characterNum;
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO EpisodeCharacter (episodeNum, characterNum) VALUES (#{episodeNum}, #{characterNum});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EpisodeCharacter WHERE episodeNum = #{episodeNum} AND characterNum = #{characterNum};
